title:
Lipschitz multivalued perturbations of integro-differential prox-regular
  sweeping processes
authors: Tahar Haddad, Sarra Gaouir and Lionel Thibault
abstract:
Integro-differential sweeping processes with prox-regular sets in Hilbert
spaces have been the subject of various recent studies. Diverse applications of
such differential inclusions to complementarity problems, electrical circuits,
frictionless contact, can be found in the literature. Here we provide a general
theorem of existence of solution for such processes perturbed by a Lipschitz
multimapping with nonconvex values.
